user stories.input: As a team member, I want to see the first iteration of beta up on cloud.gov

tasks.description: Set up cloud.gov account and project space
Share access credentials with team members

user stories.input: As a developer, I want to have the subdomain beta.nsf.gov be set up, so that I can deploy a beta site to it

tasks.description: Request subdomain creation through NSF IT
Set up SSL certificate for subdomain
Configure deployment pipeline to use subdomain

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to understand the process of switching the cloud.gov hosting plan over from prototype to FISMA low

tasks.description: Schedule meeting with cloud.gov support team

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to meet with DIS / cloud.gov, so that I can determine the requirements for the beta.nsf.gov ATO

tasks.description: Schedule meeting with DIS and cloud.gov teams

user stories.input: As a stakeholder, I want to have a decision on whether or not the blog aggregator may work for beta, and if not what will

tasks.description: Test aggregator with NSF content requirements
Document pros and cons of aggregator approach

user stories.input: As a content editor, I want to be able to easily find content, so that I can edit it
As a user, I want to add a video to my article
As a content editor, I want to be able to add videos from Brightcove

tasks.description: Add video selection and embed functionality
Implement video preview and metadata display
Add video management and organization tools

user stories.input: As an author, I want to be able to indent / outdent content

tasks.description: Add indent/outdent buttons to editor toolbar

user stories.input: As a stakeholder, I want to see the results of user research, so that I can determine if the CMS is right for me

tasks.description: Compile user research findings into report
Create executive summary of key insights
Develop CMS recommendation based on research

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to test the user research plan, so that I make sure the in-person interviews are effective and capturing the right information

tasks.description: Test interview recording and note-taking process
Update research plan based on pilot results

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to have the finalized OLPA task script, so that I can begin testing with internal users

tasks.description: Review and refine OLPA task scenarios
Develop success criteria for each task

user stories.input: As a research participant, I want to make sure that the appearance of the prototype does not distract from the workflow, so that I can complete the user interview

tasks.description: Test prototype clarity with sample users

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to have the WIG prototype, so that I can finalize the second task script

tasks.description: Create task scenarios based on prototype features

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to have a list of priority workflow candidates that we might test, so that I can make sure we're capturing the priority areas

tasks.description: Prioritize workflows by importance and frequency

user stories.input: As a researcher, I want to develop the user research protocol for internal workflows, so that we can begin testing against a CMS prototype
As a researcher, I want to recruit for the last round of user research, so that we can summarize findings and synthesize results

tasks.description: Create recruitment materials and outreach plan

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to continue scheduling interviews for hypothesis #1, so that I can be prepared to test our first prototype
As a user researcher, I want to begin identifying interview participants, so that I can understand what educators and science influencers need from a future nsf.gov website

tasks.description: Develop recruitment criteria and screening questions

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to set up a website recruitment test, so that I can see if we can recruit users in real time from the website

tasks.description: Test recruitment flow and conversion rates

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to make sure the correct NSF people are invited to user interviews, so that they can observe the interviews and make recommendations accordingly

tasks.description: Identify relevant NSF stakeholders for each interview type
Prepare observation materials and note-taking templates

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to begin drafting a research plan, so that I can begin recruiting participants

tasks.description: Identify target user groups and criteria

user stories.input: As a potential research participant, I want to learn about the research and leave my contact information

tasks.description: Add privacy notice and consent information

user stories.input: As a user researcher, I want to conduct a user definition workshop with NSF, so that I can better prepare them and the team for future research work

tasks.description: Create user persona templates and exercises
Schedule and coordinate NSF participant attendance

user stories.input: As a designer, I want to have a new social media wireframe, so that I can begin implementing design

tasks.description: Create wireframe layouts for social features

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to have a prioritized list of features and elements of a future social element page, so that I can work with the engineers to determine feasibility

tasks.description: Prioritize features by user value and complexity

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to determine a design direction for the beta social page, so that we can implement a beta site quickly without established brand guidelines

tasks.description: Select design direction and document rationale

user stories.input: As a VisualDesigner, I want to concept different styles for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design concepts with stakeholders

tasks.description: Research NSF brand and visual identity

user stories.input: As a VisualDesigner, I want to create a moodboard to aid with visual design concepts for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design concepts with stakeholders

tasks.description: Organize mood board themes and categories
Align mood boards with project goals
Present mood boards to stakeholders for feedback

user stories.input: As a VisualDesigner, I want to demonstrate the value of visual design to the NSF project team, so that visual design is an integral part of a redesign

tasks.description: Research visual design impact on user experience
Prepare business case for design investment
Present design value proposition to team

user stories.input: As a designer, I want to have a style guide / design guide / content guide, so that we have a uniform way of delivering product

tasks.description: Define content style and tone guidelines

user stories.input: As a site administrator, I want to understand how other similar organizations are handling visual design, so that I can make informed decisions about what appears to work well and what doesn't

tasks.description: Conduct visual design audit and analysis
Document design patterns and best practices

user stories.input: As a site administrator, I want to understand how other similar organizations are handling content, so that I can make informed decisions about what appears to work well and what doesn't

tasks.description: Analyze content strategies of similar organizations
Document content types and organizational approaches
Evaluate content effectiveness and user engagement

user stories.input: As a CMS administrator, I want to have roles, so that I can assign them to my users

tasks.description: Define user role types and permissions

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to narrow down the universe of CMS options and identify/prioritize key considerations for getting to the next step

tasks.description: Create evaluation criteria and scoring matrix
Document pros and cons of top candidates

user stories.input: As a CMS SME, I want to see the webmaster workflow report, so that I can understand how this might impact current direction

tasks.description: Document current workflow processes and pain points
Assess impact on CMS selection criteria
Update CMS requirements based on workflow findings

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to understand what the MVP should look like, so that I can begin understanding workflow needs as they pertain to any CMS decision

tasks.description: Define MVP scope and core features
Create MVP user stories and acceptance criteria
Assess CMS capability requirements for MVP

user stories.input: As an NSF administrator, I want to shadow the CMS implementation, so that I can learn as the prototype is developed further

tasks.description: Schedule regular CMS development shadowing sessions
Create learning objectives and documentation templates

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to understand how time off overlaps with plans around the user research

tasks.description: Map time off against research timeline
Create backup plans for key activities

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to have a final workshop to identify key lessons and features for the content management system decision
As an NSF employee, I want to understand work performed, so that I can understand when and what I can use later
As an NSF employee, I want to have high-level strategy recommendations to implement in conjunction with the new CMS
As an NSF employee, I want to have editorial-planning recommendations, so that I can understand how they might impact an eventual CMS / future web presence

tasks.description: Assess CMS impact on editorial workflows

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to know how brand guidelines are developed and maintained, so that I can incorporate them throughout the project

tasks.description: Document NSF brand requirements and constraints

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to know how visual design directions were developed, so that I can make better design decisions in the future

tasks.description: Identify design success factors and lessons learned
Build design knowledge base for future use

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to know what the first hypothesis is, so that I can start developing a prototype to test

tasks.description: Set success criteria for hypothesis testing

user stories.input: As a content designer, I want to develop a better understanding of NSF's content types and editorial plan, so that I can make more informed recommendations going forward

tasks.description: Audit existing content types and categories
Map content workflows and approval processes

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to have a prototype strategy, so that I understand how we will gain understandings from tests that will drive recommendations

tasks.description: Define prototype objectives and success metrics
Plan prototype iteration and refinement process
Design feedback collection and analysis approach

user stories.input: As a content designer, I want to demonstrate the value of user-centered content design to ensure it's an integral part of our recommendations

tasks.description: Research content design impact on user experience
Integrate content design into project recommendations

user stories.input: As a developer, I want to know what the three initial hypotheses are, so that I can plan work around development of prototypes

tasks.description: Define prototype requirements for each hypothesis
Create development timeline and resource plan

user stories.input: As a designer, I want to know what early indications of hypotheses might be, so that I can start planning for the first prototype
As a user researcher, I want to know when outreach to lists is successful, so that I can plan on a new release to the next listserv on the priority list

tasks.description: Set up outreach tracking and analytics
Define success metrics for listserv outreach

user stories.input: As an NSF employee, I want to schedule regular in-person check-ins, so that we can continue to communicate the goals of the project with our stakeholders

tasks.description: Identify key stakeholders for regular check-ins
Prepare project status and goals materials

user stories.input: As a workshop attendee, I want to have a summary of what we learned, so that I can understand our next steps and how they apply to me

tasks.description: Document workshop key findings and insights
Create personalized action items for attendees

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to have a schedule of more coworking slots, so that I can work in tandem with the rest of the team on a more regular basis

tasks.description: Plan coworking session agendas and objectives

user stories.input: As an NSF person interested in attending user interviews, I want to know when they are scheduled and the type of user that will be interviewed
As an NSF member of the team, I want to have a place where I can access all the related reports and documentation, so that I can refer to it easily now and in the future

tasks.description: Organize documents by category and date
Set up access permissions and security
Train team members on document system use

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to know when the mid-point checkin is and what will be covered, so that I can plan accordingly

tasks.description: Prepare project status and progress materials
Identify key discussion topics and decisions

Create issue assignment and workflow processes

tasks.description: Set up repository access and permissions
Create issue assignment and workflow processes
Set up notifications and communication preferences

tasks.description: Set up meeting room and technology requirements

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to know when meetings are, so that I can plan accordingly

tasks.description: Send calendar invitations to all participants
Set up meeting reminders and notifications
Coordinate across time zones and schedules

user stories.input: As a team member, I want to understand how work moves between UX/content > visual design > front end dev for a sprint cycle

tasks.description: Set up workflow tracking and monitoring
